Uses of Class
org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration

  • Packages that use UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation
    Annotation-based setup for Spring MVC.

    • Uses of UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration in org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation

      Methods in org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation that return UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.attributes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> attributes)
      Set static attributes to be added to the model of every request for all views resolved by this view resolver.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.cache(boolean cache)
      Enable or disable caching.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.cacheLimit(int cacheLimit)
      Specify the maximum number of entries for the view cache.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration ViewResolverRegistry.freeMarker()
      Register a FreeMarker view resolver with an empty default view name prefix and a default suffix of ".ftl".
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration ViewResolverRegistry.groovy()
      Register a Groovy markup view resolver with an empty default view name prefix and a default suffix of ".tpl".
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration ViewResolverRegistry.jsp()
      Register JSP view resolver using a default view name prefix of "/WEB-INF/" and a default suffix of ".jsp".
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration ViewResolverRegistry.jsp(java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String suffix)
      Register JSP view resolver with the specified prefix and suffix.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.prefix(java.lang.String prefix)
      Set the prefix that gets prepended to view names when building a URL.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration ViewResolverRegistry.scriptTemplate()
      Register a script template view resolver with an empty default view name prefix and suffix.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.suffix(java.lang.String suffix)
      Set the suffix that gets appended to view names when building a URL.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration ViewResolverRegistry.tiles()
      Register Tiles 3.x view resolver.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.viewClass(java.lang.Class<?> viewClass)
      Set the view class that should be used to create views.
      UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration UrlBasedViewResolverRegistration.viewNames(java.lang.String... viewNames)
      Set the view names (or name patterns) that can be handled by this view resolver.
